action.name: core.create
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): create
action.description: Allow users in the group to CREATE new Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category. but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.delete
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): delete
action.description: Allow users in the group to DELETE Items/Categories (any item) in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.delete.own
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): delete own
action.description: Allow users in the group to DELETE OWNED Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.edit
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): edit
action.description: Allow users in the group to EDIT (all) Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.edit.own
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): edit own
action.description: Allow users in the group to EDIT OWNED Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.edit.state
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): edit state
action.description: Allow users in the group to ALTER the PUBLICATION STATE of Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: core.edit.state.own
action.title: Items/Categories (inherited): edit state own
action.description: Allow users in the group to ALTER the PUBLICATION STATE of OWNED Items/Categories in any category. NOTE: You can explicitely deny per category, but if set to deny here, you cann't expicitely allow per category.

action.name: flexicontent.displayallitems

action.title: Items (Backend Tab): Copy Task
action.description: Allow users in the group to use the Item Copy Task (in items management)
